item.title: Kevin add a quote by Friedrich Nietzsche
item.description: "That which does not kill us makes us stronger." -- Friedrich Nietzsche

item.title: Kevin add a quote by William Butler Yeats
Kevin add a quote by Margaret Atwood
item.description: "War is what happens when language fails." -- Margaret Atwood

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Langston Hughes
item.description: "Humor is laughing at what you haven't got when you ought to have it." -- Langston Hughes

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Arakawa Hiromu
item.description: "Stand up and walk. Move on. After all, you have perfect legs to stand on." -- Arakawa Hiromu

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Hiromu Arakawa
item.description: "Nothing's perfect, the world's not perfect. But it's there for us, trying the best it can; that's what makes it so damn beautiful." -- Hiromu Arakawa

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Hiromu Arakawa
item.description: "Even when our eyes are closed, there's a whole world that exists outside ourselves and our dreams." -- Hiromu Arakawa

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Kurt Vonnegut
item.description: "Those who believe in telekinetics, raise my hand." -- Kurt Vonnegut

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "For instance, on the planet Earth, man had always assumed that he was more intelligent than dolphins because he had achieved so much&mdash;the wheel, New York, wars and so on&mdash;whilst all the dolphins had ever done was muck about in the water having a good time. But conversely, the dolphins had always believed that they were far more intelligent than man&mdash;for precisely the same reasons." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Robert Orben
item.description: "Illegal aliens have always been a problem in the United States. Ask any Indian." -- Robert Orben

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The story so far: In the beginning the Universe was created. This has made a lot of people very angry and been widely regarded as a bad move." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "There is a theory which states that if ever anyone discovers exactly what the Universe is for and why it is here, it will instantly disappear and be replaced by something even more bizarre and inexplicable. There is another theory which states that this has already happened." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "The fact that we live at the bottom of a deep gravity well, on the surface of a gas covered planet going around a nuclear fireball 90 million miles away and think this to be normal is obviously some indication of how skewed our perspective tends to be." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "It is known that there are an infinite number of worlds, simply because there is an infinite amount of space for them to be in. However, not every one of them is inhabited. Therefore, there must be a finite number of inhabited worlds. Any finite number divided by infinity is as near to nothing as makes no odds, so the average population of all the planets in the Universe can be said to be zero. From this it follows that the population of the whole Universe is also zero, and that any people you may meet from time to time are merely the products of a deranged imagination." -- Douglas Adams

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Douglas Adams
Kevin add a quote by Hiromu Arakawa
item.description: "Humankind cannot gain something without first giving something in return. To obtain, something of equal value must be lost. This is Alchemy's First Law of Equivalent Exchange. In those days, we really believed that to be the world's one, and only, truth." -- Hiromu Arakawa

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Orson Scott Card
Kevin add a quote by George Lucas
item.description: "No! Try not. Do, or do not. There is no try." -- George Lucas

item.title: Kevin add a quote by Douglas Adams
item.description: "I love deadlines. I love the whooshing noise they make as they go by." -- Douglas Adams
